rules.title: SERVER RULES
rules.description:
Welcome to our community!

To ensure a harmonious and productive environment, we ask all members to adhere to the following guidelines...

fields.name: **Rule 1**
fields.value: NSFW or obscene content, including nudity, extreme violence, or any content deemed inappropriate, is strictly prohibited.

fields.name: **Rule 2**
fields.value: Toxic behaviour, such as bullying, instigating conflicts, or any other negative actions, will not be tolerated.

fields.name: **Rule 3**
fields.value:
Everyone deserves respect.
Harassment, sexism, racism, or hate speech in any form is unacceptable.

fields.name: **Rule 4**
fields.value: Discrimination based on gender, race, religion, sexuality, or political beliefs is strictly forbidden.

fields.name: **Rule 5**
fields.value:
Do not direct message, tag, or pester the BOII | Development staff.
If assistance is required, please open a ticket.

fields.name: **Rule 6**
fields.value: Spamming in chats or channels, whether through messages, reactions, emojis, or gifs, is not permitted.

fields.name: **Rule 7**
fields.value: Use language responsibly. While occasional swearing is acceptable, refrain from excessive or offensive swearing.

fields.name: **Rule 8**
fields.value:
Guard your personal information and respect the privacy of others.
Sharing or requesting personal details without consent is prohibited.

fields.name: **Rule 9**
fields.value: Impersonation of staff members or fellow community members will result in immediate action.

fields.name: **Rule 10**
fields.value: Leaking or unauthorized distribution of community assets, content, or confidential information is a severe violation and will result in stringent consequences.

fields.name: **Rule 11**
fields.value: Members are requested not to DM others for work-related requests or promotions without prior consent.

fields.name: **Rule 12**
fields.value: Always adhere to platform-specific guidelines and regulations.

fields.name: **Rule 13**
fields.value: If you wish to promote or share external content, seek permission from the staff beforehand.

fields.name: **Rule 14**
fields.value:
Adherence to these guidelines is crucial for community harmony.
To access the server, press ‚úÖ below.

no_participants.title: Giveaway Ended!
no_participants.description: Unfortunately, no one participated in the giveaway.

ticket.title: Support Tickets
ticket.description:
Click on one of the buttons below to open a support ticket.

You are required to fill in a pop-up form prior to the ticket being opened.
Please fill this out in as much detail as possible as it will help to speed up the help we can provide.

Our support hours are as follows:

**Monday - Friday: 10AM - 10PM (GMT)**

Please be aware if you open a ticket outside of our support hours there may be a slight wait, apologies but we are humans too, we cannot be here 24/7 unfortunately.

‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨

modal_fields.placeholder: Describe the impact of this issue...
